description.text:
[url=https://discord.gg/v3gYmYamGJ][img]https://img.shields.io/badge/Discord-7289da?logo=discord&logoColor=fff&style=flat-square[/img][/url][url=https://ko-fi.com/jodsderechte][img]https://custom-icon-badges.demolab.com/badge/-Support-lightgrey?style=flat-square&logo=kofi&color=222222[/img][/url] [url=https://www.twitch.tv/Jodsderechte][img]https://custom-icon-badges.demolab.com/badge/-Catch%20me%20Live-lightgrey?style=flat-square&logo=Twitch&color=22283D[/img][/url]

This WA is a replacement of the DBM and BigWigs default timer bars, with lots of customization options.
You will still need either DBM or BigWigs installed for it to work. This WA simply hijacks DBM/BW timers and makes its own timers. 
Supports highlighting specific Alerts via replacing the text or adding TextColor/Glow while also giving you the ability to add "ticks" on the bar to more clearly put an emphasis on the abilitys that are about to happen within 5/10 seconds


[b][color=#ff0000][size=36]THERE IS NO USE IN ME ANSWERING "OH IT'S NOT WORKING" MESSAGES SO I WILL ONLY RESPOND TO THEM IF A BUGSACK MESSAGE IS INCLUDED!!!

FAQ & Known Issues: read below before posting a question [/size][/color][/b]

Q: My BW bars sometimes keep showing eventhough i have "hide bw bars" enabled?
A: Make sure the bar style in bw options is set to default. Also make sure you have not changed the limit settings for bars. BigWigs -> Bars -> Bars tab -> Visible bar limit (default is 100).

Q: My DBM bars keep showing eventhough i have "hide dbm bars" enabled?
A: Using Addonskins together with that option will never work. Also make sure to /reload after updating the aura.

Q: The timeline used to show Trash mob abilities. Why doesn't it do that anymore?
A: It was a bug in dbm that they showed at all and that got fixed. If you realy want that make your case [url=https://github.com/WeakAuras/WeakAuras2/issues/5484]here [/url]

Q: I don't have cooldowntext on my icon like in the gif how do i fix?
A: You either go to the aura called "raid ability icon" there go to the display tab and check the box infront of the text that says %p or you use external addons like OmniCC or Elvui's Cooldown text

Q: Does this work in dungeons?
A: Yes. If your DBM or BW currently works in dungeons, then this WA will too.

Q: How to change the size of the icons
A: Display tab -> Icon size. 

Q: How to move text to the right side
A: go to display tab press the coghweel on text 1 and change this setting https://imgur.com/a/pI8FtIy . Repeat this for both the icon waiting group and the "Raid Ability Timeline Icon <10".

Q: Is there a way to make it horizontal instead of vertical?
A: The problem with lining up icons horizontally is that there wouldn't be enough room for the spell name text above/below each icon, since the text orientation is always horizontal as well.

Q: How do i get the Icons to look like in the Preview?
A: If you dislike the default look of icons there are various ways to get icons "skinned". Below are some options
[ol]
[li]Masque and skins like ElvUIesque or Flat Squares - [url=https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/masque]Curseforge[/url] [/li]
[li]Clean Icons: Thin - [url=https://www.wowinterface.com/downloads/fileinfo.php?id=24559#info]WoWInterface[/url] (This replaces art files and will apply to everything that uses the icon)[/li]
[li]Clean Icons: Mechagnome Edition -- (AI neural network image upscaling), bigger file sizes, but better image quality: [url=https://www.wowinterface.com/downloads/info25064-CleanIcons-MechagnomeEdition.html]WoWInterface[/url] [/li]
[li]Simply use the Zoom setting in the WA Display tab (around 30% usually removes the ugly border)[/li]
[/ol]
Q: HALP! My DBM bars are gone forever after uninstalling this WA.
A: Paste the following macro into your chat /run DBT:ResetSkin() if that doesn't do the trick (which it should) go into WTF\Account\<Account #>\SavedVariables\ and delete DBM-StatusBarTimers.lua

Based on the very Popular [url=https://wago.io/B1pfxTOtb]Raid Ability Timeline[/url]
Every feedback/help is greatly appreciated feel free to contact me by joining my [url=https://discord.gg/v3gYmYamGJ]Discord[/url].

If you like my work and want to support me you can [url=https://www.paypal.com/donate/?hosted_button_id=PSQ4D3HXNZKMG]donate[/url]
description.html:
This WA is a replacement of the DBM and BigWigs default timer bars, with lots of customization options. You will still need either DBM or BigWigs installed for it to work. This WA simply hijacks DBM/BW timers and makes its own timers. Supports highlighting specific Alerts via replacing the text or adding TextColor/Glow while also giving you the ability to add "ticks" on the bar to more clearly put an emphasis on the abilitys that are about to happen within 5/10 seconds THERE IS NO USE IN ME ANSWERING "OH IT'S NOT WORKING" MESSAGES SO I WILL ONLY RESPOND TO THEM IF A BUGSACK MESSAGE IS INCLUDED!!! FAQ & Known Issues: read below before posting a question Q: My BW bars sometimes keep showing eventhough i have "hide bw bars" enabled? A: Make sure the bar style in bw options is set to default. Also make sure you have not changed the limit settings for bars. BigWigs -> Bars -> Bars tab -> Visible bar limit (default is 100). Q: My DBM bars keep showing eventhough i have "hide dbm bars" enabled? A: Using Addonskins together with that option will never work. Also make sure to /reload after updating the aura. Q: The timeline used to show Trash mob abilities. Why doesn't it do that anymore? A: It was a bug in dbm that they showed at all and that got fixed. If you realy want that make your case here Q: I don't have cooldowntext on my icon like in the gif how do i fix? A: You either go to the aura called "raid ability icon" there go to the display tab and check the box infront of the text that says %p or you use external addons like OmniCC or Elvui's Cooldown text Q: Does this work in dungeons? A: Yes. If your DBM or BW currently works in dungeons, then this WA will too. Q: How to change the size of the icons A: Display tab -> Icon size. Q: How to move text to the right side A: go to display tab press the coghweel on text 1 and change this setting https://imgur.com/a/pI8FtIy . Repeat this for both the icon waiting group and the "Raid Ability Timeline Icon <10". Q: Is there a way to make it horizontal instead of vertical? A: The problem with lining up icons horizontally is that there wouldn't be enough room for the spell name text above/below each icon, since the text orientation is always horizontal as well. Q: How do i get the Icons to look like in the Preview? A: If you dislike the default look of icons there are various ways to get icons "skinned". Below are some options
  1. Masque and skins like ElvUIesque or Flat Squares - Curseforge
  2. Clean Icons: Thin - WoWInterface (This replaces art files and will apply to everything that uses the icon)
  3. Clean Icons: Mechagnome Edition -- (AI neural network image upscaling), bigger file sizes, but better image quality: WoWInterface
  4. Simply use the Zoom setting in the WA Display tab (around 30% usually removes the ugly border)
Q: HALP! My DBM bars are gone forever after uninstalling this WA. A: Paste the following macro into your chat /run DBT:ResetSkin() if that doesn't do the trick (which it should) go into WTF\Account\<Account #>\SavedVariables\ and delete DBM-StatusBarTimers.lua Based on the very Popular Raid Ability Timeline Every feedback/help is greatly appreciated feel free to contact me by joining my Discord. If you like my work and want to support me you can donate

collections.name: AURAS WEBS SEASON 1 THE WAR WITHIN

changelog.text: Some paused timers forgot they were no longer supposed to touch those variables. This should now be fixed
Some paused timers wanted to get their hands on variables that are no longer exposed to custom auras. This is now fixed and they have been told how to properly ask for the correct location.
Big wigs Pull timers sometimes felt very festive and wanted to be known as Partytimer. This is now fixed and they should be in proper attire again.
reenable big icon
fixed unsupported anchor spam for paused timers since newest wa release
add option to limit text length of big icon
add renaming and glow capability to big icon
minor tww fix
fix Big wigs bar hiding for newest big wigs version
fixes for TWW

do more nilchecking to work around big wigs changing their anchors. 

This means in current alpha (and prob TWW release version) big wigs hiding will no longer work and i'm unsure if i want to keep moving forward with big wigs hiding. For now your best bet is moving the anchors of screen manually
add option to turn off coloring of text
- fixed bw text color to not work properly
fix text anchor for 2. %c
add text position adjustment for paused timers
fix name color not working when using spellid to replace it
fixed SpellId options to work agaiain cause of type mismatch with new trigger
change to new boss mod trigger
changed some default options to be clearer
-adjust bw bar hiding
-fixed error for bigwigs users
- switch to mostly default triggers
- added option to show ticks text on left
added ability to hide ticks text
- atempt to fix possible click through errors?
- reimport for DF version badge
- fixed getdata warning

- changed text formating for %p
- added option to hide icons from bar when converted to bigicon (note: the actual timer being displayed is 5 seconds off but that is not fixable without increasing resource cost of the aura by alot)
-changed grow direction of bigicon
- fixed potential nil error
nested is finally here time for BigIcon Release!

- some code refactoring for better performance
- changed the BigIcon to use Weakauras internal triggers instead of custom stuff (less options but less work to maintain)
- hopefully fixed truncuating for cyrillc languages
-added nilcheck for resuming of Paused timers
- Changed error msg on incompatible Anchors to be less cryptic
- another attempt to fix bw bar hiding
-another attempt to fix BW bar hiding
-bw bar hiding should be way more reliable now
- fixed error on Paused Timers
- fixed hiding of bw bars
-attempted nilerror fix
- Reworked BW bar hiding so it should work with Addonskins and other skinning addons

- fixed glowcall on subregions when setting custom glow color via custom options

comments.text: [taggeduser]@LusterPurge[/taggeduser] I forive your ignorance. You need them turned on (the wa will hide them for you). Disabling them in dbm disables their functionality completly which in turn disables any weakauras that work off the timer

Please forgive my ignorance. When using this WA with DBM do I need to have the DBM bars toggled for it to work? I have them turned off currently and it only shows the countdown timer etc. What am I doing wrong?
